item.title: My Experience Building a Blog Using Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.author: christopherjharris@protonmail.com (Chris Harris)
item.description: Given you are seeing this post, it means that I have been successful in creating my blog. However, I wanted to go further into how this came about, the decisions I made, issues I encountered and generally overall how I found this experience. The aim of this post is not to provide a tutorial, but to provide an experience piece on how I found these tools. I decided to build a blog in the first place simply to learn new skills.
